name: Brazilian Students Association
description:
About us

The Brazilian Students Association (BRSA) is an official Texas A&M University organization.Our mission is to integrate and support the Brazilian community living in the Bryan/College Station area and to promote Brazil and its culture throughout Texas A&M University as well as Bryan/College Station community.

Since its establishment in 1982, BRSA has been committed to promoting the Brazilian culture and integrating Brazilians to their new life at Bryan / College Station. We accomplish this goal by organizing social and cultural events over the year. Creating a friendly atmosphere for those who are away from our homeland or want to learn more about our country.

You do not have to be Brazilian to join our family! If you want to know more about us and our events, don't hesitate to send us a message. We encourage anyone to become a active member in our organization.
summary: The mission of the BRSA is to integrate and support the Brazilian community living in the Bryan/College Station area and to promote Brazil and its culture throughout Texas A&M University as well as Bryan/College Station community....
